mapper.select: SELECT * FROM price_books p LEFT JOIN price_books_and_price_and_products pbapap ON pbapap.price_books_id = p.pb_id LEFT JOIN price_and_products pap ON pap.bask_id = pbapap.price_and_products_id WHERE p.pb_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO price_books(pb_currency, pb_enabled, pb_validFrom, pb_validTo, pb_date_created, pb_date_modified) VALUES(${currency.toString()}, #{enabled}, #{validFrom}, #{validTo}, #{created}, #{modified})
mapper.update: UPDATE price_books SET pb_currency = ${currency.toString()}, pb_enabled = #{enabled}, pb_validFrom = #{validFrom}, pb_validTo = #{validTo}, pb_date_created = #{created}, pb_date_modified = #{modified}
